Welcome to Santa Video Call & Tracker 8.0!
- New video call content! Now with double the call variants and scene options!
- Santa now knows what gift you want! Available as a main scene in the video calls!
- Improved Christmas Eve call. Santa now has his list on his sleigh so he knows all your details!
- Improved call recordings. Now the app captures Santa as well as the caller!
- All new Parents Section design!
- New search function when selecting child names!
- More name additions!
- Bug fixes!

8.2.1 - New Content Update
- New video call content! Now with double the call variants and scene options compared to 2017!
- Santa now knows what gift you want! Available as a main scene in the video calls!
- Better iPad interface - makes full use of the iPads larger screen!
- Improved Christmas Eve call. Santa now has his list on his sleigh so he knows all your details!
- Improved call recordings. Now the app captures Santa as well as the caller!
- All new Parents Section design!
- New search function when selecting child names!
- More name additions! Almost 7000 names now included (Pro version only)!
- Bug fixes

Welcome to Santa Video Call & Tracker™ version 9.0! With a whole new season of video call content for you to enjoy!
- Now with Instagram integration!
- Incoming calls - Santa can finally make outgoing video calls!  Schedule a call today!
- Even more names! Well over 7000 now included!
- Santa's Written Blogs 2019!
- North Pole News 2019!
- Gift wanted is now a child fact option!
- All video clips have been redubbed so that the video audio matches perfectly with the custom child details!

Add over 100 scenes of new video call content to the app with Video Content Pack 01! Designed for long-time users of the app, this content pack refreshes the video calls with all new content! Which includes:
- Completely new scenes for each part of the video call
- Revamped multi-child calls
- Much more variety during the Child Facts section of the calls
- A bunch of brand new main scenes!
- A completely new Xmas Eve call!

Add 12 Video Blogs straight from the North Pole! For the first time ever, Santa answers your long-time questions in a series of Video Blogs!
